result.ga: An bhfuil aithne agat ar Phól
result.orig: An bhfuil aithne agat ar Phól
result.html: An bhfuil aithne agat ar PhólDo you know Paul?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aiṫne agat ar ṖólDo you know Paul?

result.ga: Ar cuireadh in aithne dá chéile sibh
result.orig: Ar cuireadh in aithne dá chéile sibh
result.html: Ar cuireadh in aithne dá chéile sibhHave you been introduced?
result.ponchtml: Ar cuireaḋ in aiṫne dá ċéile siḃHave you been introduced?

result.eng: I would like to introduce myself to them.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom mé féin a chur in aithne dóibh
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom mé féin a chur in aithne dóibh
result.html: Ba mhaith liom mé féin a chur in aithne dóibhI would like to introduce myself to them.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom mé féin a ċur in aiṫne dóiḃI would like to introduce myself to them.

result.eng: I would like to introduce you to the President.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom tú a chur in aithne don Uachtarán
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom tú a chur in aithne don Uachtarán
result.html: Ba mhaith liom tú a chur in aithne don UachtaránI would like to introduce you to the President.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom tú a ċur in aiṫne don UaċtaránI would like to introduce you to the President.

result.eng: He introduced his new wife to us.
result.ga: Chuir sé a bhean chéile nua in aithne dúinn
result.orig: Chuir sé a bhean chéile nua in aithne dúinn
result.html: Chuir sé a bhean chéile nua in aithne dúinnHe introduced his new wife to us.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé a ḃean ċéile nua in aiṫne dúinnHe introduced his new wife to us.

result.eng: Get to know the Donegal Gaeltacht.
result.ga: Cuir aithne ar Ghaeltacht Dhún na nGall
result.orig: Cuir aithne ar Ghaeltacht Dhún na nGall
result.html: Cuir aithne ar Ghaeltacht Dhún na nGallGet to know the Donegal Gaeltacht.
result.ponchtml: Cuir aiṫne ar Ġaeltaċt Ḋún na nGallGet to know the Donegal Gaeltacht.

result.html: Fear atá ar m'aithneA man I know.
result.ponchtml: Fear atá ar m'aiṫneA man I know.

result.eng: In fact, this republic did not receive much international recognition.
result.ga: I ndáiríre níor tugadh a lán aithne idirnáisiúnta don phoblacht seo
result.orig: I ndáiríre níor tugadh a lán aithne idirnáisiúnta don phoblacht seo
result.html: I ndáiríre níor tugadh a lán aithne idirnáisiúnta don phoblacht seoIn fact, this republic did not receive much international recognition.
result.ponchtml: I ndáiríre níor tugaḋ a lán aiṫne idirnáisiúnta don ṗoblaċt seoIn fact, this republic did not receive much international recognition.

result.eng: I only know him through the Internet.
result.html: Níl agam air ach ríomhaithneI only know him through the Internet.
result.ponchtml: Níl agam air aċ ríoṁaiṫneI only know him through the Internet.

result.ga: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo bhean
result.orig: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo bhean
result.html: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo bheanDo you know my wife?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aiṫne agat ar mo ḃeanDo you know my wife?

result.ga: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo dheartháir
result.orig: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo dheartháir
result.html: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo dheartháirDo you know my brother?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aiṫne agat ar mo ḋearṫáirDo you know my brother?

result.ga: An bhfuil aithne agaibh ar mo dheirfiúr
result.orig: An bhfuil aithne agaibh ar mo dheirfiúr
result.html: An bhfuil aithne agaibh ar mo dheirfiúrDo you know my sister?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aiṫne agaiḃ ar mo ḋeirfiúrDo you know my sister?

result.ga: Tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sin
result.orig: Tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sin
result.html: Tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sinYou know everybody, then?
result.ponchtml: Tá aiṫne agat ar gaċ éinne mar sinYou know everybody, then?

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ga: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.orig: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.html: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon údar agamsa lena ċeapaḋ naċ raiḃ aiṫne acu ar a ċéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.

result.html: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthiI've known her long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá seanaiṫne agamsa uirṫiI've known her long time.

result.eng: Well, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
result.ga: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag di
result.orig: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag di
result.html: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag diWell, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃail sin an seaċtú haiṫne agat is déan a ṁór nó a ḃeag diWell, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.

result.eng: He thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ga: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.orig: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.html: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithneHe thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis gur ċeart dó glór a ċinn a aiṫneHe thought he should recognize his voice.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.

result.ga: Ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithne
result.orig: Ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithne
result.html: Ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithneNobody could recognize him.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ dul ag aon duine a aiṫneNobody could recognize him.
